trans-unit.target: Gear Customization<tab>Enables personal gear to be customized with the company crest.
Company Actions<tab>Enables execution of company actions.
Chest Expansion<tab>Increases the number of company chest compartments to three.
Crest Expansion<tab>Increases the variety of company crest designs.
Action Expansion<tab>Increases the maximum number of inactive and active company actions.
Land Acquisition<tab>Enables the acquisition of land in residential districts.
Chest Expansion<tab>Increases the number of company chest compartments to four.
Action Expansion<tab>Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
Chest Expansion<tab>Increases the number of company chest compartments to five.
Action Expansion<tab>Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
Action Expansion<tab>Increases the maximum number of inactive company actions.
